text: Room and staff were excellent breakfast really good. Access to public transport
Excellent location with good access to public transport. Rooms are not equipped with fridges
The location is good and near to public transportation. the room is small no restaurant
Very relaxing spacious great atmosphere. Just a bit far from the center but good access to public transport
Very luxurious room for the price nice breakfast buffet good access to public transport. The dolls outside our room in the corridor were slightly creepy
Good location good access to public transport to city Good size rooms Internet OK Very comfortable Adequate car parking in street. MInimul crockery and no good sized mugs or cups
The hotel was in a good neighborhood near public transportation We easily walked to the Louvre It is a good central location

Nice view over park quiet Good access via public transport. room heating blowing but not heating first night mentioned it at reception and was better second night but still not really warm thin duvet would have been fine normally

Well maintained tastefully decorated Good breakfast Friendly helpful staff Good access to public transport the Royal Albert Hall. Breakfast time a little chaotic Had to wait a while for parts of buffet to be replenished a couple of staff were a bit terse
Excellent Interiors. Location is not good and difficult to approach by public transport But they provide a free shuttle to the nearest station
Very clean room very helpful and friendly staff Good location near public transport Decent hairdryer located by a mirror and not in the bathroom. Nothing
good hotel near public transport. hotel restaurant was shut at the weekend as are local places to eat due to hotel being in banking district in London
In a good area near public transport into London. Room size really small for what we paid bed also very small for two people bathroom had to squeeze in past a chair small again inside the bathroom

Good location near public transport Nice room with updated bathroom Friendly staff. Bedroom was very hot even though it was freezing outside and the heater was off Much traffic noise when windows open Beds slightly worn but not too bad
Hospitality and very near to Public transport and hygiene Food
The hotel near to the public transport. The shower room size small
Location was terrible Half a mile from Kings Cross and not near any public transport
Location is very near to public transport n shops Staff was helpful. Parking is very expensive
Property was centrally located near major public transportation hub Staff were friendly helpful and efficient
Near to public transport and inner city. Thin walls even chat from next room was audible
